author: Simon Difford
description: A fruity late-night cocktail to sip and contemplate. Drinking beer locally brewed from locally grown malt and hops is a very sustainable way to drink. Due to their use of ice and ingredients sourced from much further afield, cocktails are not. However, while beer is a daily staple, cocktails are a special celebratory and luxurious treat. The quest to save the planet is surely worthy of celebration, although to quote another, "All the promises will be nothing but blah, blah, blah..."
name: Blah, Blah, Blah!

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE blackberries in base of shaker
Add other ingredients, shake with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
